text: pachi jyare potana ane tena satrune pakadava lagya, te phariyadi kaheva lagyo ke musa! Sum jevi rite ga'ikale te eka vyaktinum katala karyum che, mane pana mari nakhava icche che? Tum to saheramam atyacari ane vidrohi banava mange che. Ane tari e iccha ja nathi ke melapa karavavala'o manthi bane
